questions.question: This technology creates a secure, encrypted connection over a less secure network, such as the internet.
This protocol is commonly used in VPNs to provide secure communication over the internet.
This type of VPN allows remote users to securely connect to a private network from anywhere in the world.
questions.answer: What is a Remote Access VPN?

questions.question: This term refers to the practice of routing internet traffic through a VPN server to hide the user's IP address and location.
This open-source software is widely used for creating secure point-to-point or site-to-site connections in routed or bridged configurations.
